channel.title: CVE Feed for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-1917|2024-05-24T07:41:08.628Z -- Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELSEC-L Series L26CPU-PBT
item.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric Corporation MELSEC-Q Series and MELSEC-L Series CPU modules allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute malicious code on a target product by sending a specially crafted packet.

item.title: CVE-2024-0803|2024-05-24T07:35:51.571Z -- Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELSEC-Q Series Q06UDEHCPU
item.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric Corporation MELSEC-Q Series and MELSEC-L Series CPU modules allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute malicious code on a target product by sending a specially crafted packet.

item.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric Corporation MELSEC-Q Series and MELSEC-L Series CPU modules allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute malicious code on a target product by sending a specially crafted packet.

item.title: CVE-2024-0803|2024-05-24T07:35:51.571Z -- Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELSEC-Q Series Q03UDECPU
item.description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric Corporation MELSEC-Q Series and MELSEC-L Series CPU modules allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute malicious code on a target product by sending a specially crafted packet.

item.title: CVE-2023-2062|2024-05-24T07:44:31.610Z -- Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- EtherNet/IP Configuration tool for FX5-ENET/IP SW1DNN-EIPCTFX5-BD
item.description: Missing Password Field Masking vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric Corporation EtherNet/IP configuration tools SW1DNN-EIPCT-BD and SW1DNN-EIPCTFX5-BD allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to know the password for MELSEC iQ-R Series EtherNet/IP module RJ71EIP91 and MELSEC iQ-F Series EtherNet/IP module FX5-ENET/IP. This vulnerability results in authentication bypass vulnerability, which allows the attacker to access MELSEC iQ-R Series EtherNet/IP module RJ71EIP91 and MELSEC iQ-F Series EtherNet/IP module FX5-ENET/IP via FTP.

item.title: CVE-2023-2062|2024-05-24T07:44:31.610Z -- Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- EtherNet/IP Configuration tool for RJ71EIP91 SW1DNN-EIPCT-BD
item.description: Missing Password Field Masking vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric Corporation EtherNet/IP configuration tools SW1DNN-EIPCT-BD and SW1DNN-EIPCTFX5-BD allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to know the password for MELSEC iQ-R Series EtherNet/IP module RJ71EIP91 and MELSEC iQ-F Series EtherNet/IP module FX5-ENET/IP. This vulnerability results in authentication bypass vulnerability, which allows the attacker to access MELSEC iQ-R Series EtherNet/IP module RJ71EIP91 and MELSEC iQ-F Series EtherNet/IP module FX5-ENET/IP via FTP.

item.title: CVE-2024-0802|2024-05-24T07:33:13.583Z -- Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- MELSEC-L Series L26CPU-PBT
item.description: Incorrect Pointer Scaling vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric Corporation MELSEC-Q Series and MELSEC-L Series CPU modules allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to read arbitrary information from a target product or execute malicious code on a target product by sending a specially crafted packet.
